faq.a1: Yes, your data is fully protected. We use end-to-end encryption and store all data on EU servers. We never share your data with third parties.
faq.a2: Lexora currently supports Germany, Austria, Switzerland and other European countries with legal adaptation. We are continuously expanding our coverage.

faq.a4: Absolutely! All responses generated by Lexora can be fully customized. You can change, add, or remove text.

faq.a7: With the free version you can process one complete case. For regular use we recommend our Starter or Pro plans.

aboutPage.intro: Lexora is an AI-powered assistant that helps you understand official letters and draft appropriate responses based on local regulations. We focus on Germany, Austria, Switzerland and other European countries.
aboutPage.mission: Our mission is to make legal communication accessible to everyone. Official letters often use complex language and tight deadlines. Lexora analyzes your documents, explains what is required in plain language, and helps you respond correctly.
aboutPage.values: We prioritize data security and privacy. All documents are processed on EU servers and we never share your data with third parties. Lexora is a support tool, not a substitute for legal advice—for complex matters we recommend consulting a qualified lawyer.

footer.disclaimer_text: Lexora is an AI-based assistant and does not provide legal advice. The generated content is for informational purposes only. For legally binding decisions, please consult a qualified lawyer.
